oai_dc:dc.dc:description: AN ACT to amend Section 2803 of the Code of Tennessee, being Section 4503 of R. T. Shannon's Code of Tennessee, and to repeal conflicting acts. Section 1. Be it enacted by the General Assembly of the State of Tennessee, That Section 2803 of the Code of Tennessee,being Section 4503 of H. T. Shannon's Code of Tennessee, by and the same is hereby amended by striking out the words "A father, or in case of his death or desertion of his family, the mother" and substituting therefor the words "The father and mother, or if one parent be dead or has deserted his or her family, the other" so that said section will reas (sic.) as follows: "The father and mother, or if one parent be dead or has deserted his or her family, the other may maintain an action for the expenses and the actual loss of service resulting from an injury to a minor child in the parent's service or living in the family." Section 2. Be it further enacted, That all laws or parts of laws in conflict with this Act are hereby repealed. Section 3. Ant (sic.) that this Act take effect from and after its passage, the public welfare requiring it.
